column2: # 创建散点图对象，并添加从原点出发的斜对角线
p_negY_negX8_2016 <- ggplot(data = df.Fuzzy.13, aes(x = negX8, y = negY)) +
geom_abline(slope = 1, intercept = 0, linetype = "dashed", color = "red") +  # y = x 线
xlim(range(c(df.Fuzzy.13$negX8, df.Fuzzy.13$negY))) +  # 确保X轴范围与Y轴相同
ylim(range(c(df.Fuzzy.13$negX8, df.Fuzzy.13$negY))) +  # 确保Y轴范围与X轴相同
